featured.text: The city declared a state of emergency and began aerial spraying of a pesticide to kill the mosquitoes, even though residents argued that the pesticide could be more dangerous than the disease.
Moreover, bugs that do come in contact with the mist may be resistant to the pesticide.
Many people think these bug killers or pesticides will penetrate every place where the insects hide.
They sprayed pesticide from the air.
Second, once a bug bomb is used, every surface in your home will be covered with the toxic pesticide.

definition.zh_def: 農藥：用於消滅或控制害蟲、雜草或其他有害生物的化學物質。
definition.en_def: A pesticide is a chemical substance used to kill or control pests, weeds, or other harmful organisms.
definition.example: Farmers often use pesticide to protect their crops from insects.
